Header: Canadian High Commissioner Exchanges Views with Commander
Content: HE David McKinnon, High Commissioner of Canada for Sri Lanka and Maldives on Friday (17) paid a courtesy call on the Commander of the Army, Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake at the Army Headquarters. Both of them during the meeting discussed matters, pertaining to the current security concerns and other general issues. At the end of the interactive meeting, the Commander of the Army presented a memento to the visiting diplomat. Defence Attaché at the High Commission was also associated with the occasion. Major General Ruwan De Silva, Military Secretary welcomed the High Commissioner at the entrance to the Commander’s Secretariat.
